speaker: PAGE
text_entry: SCENE III. A street leading to the Park.

speaker: PAGE
text_entry: Enter MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS FORD, and DOCTOR CAIUS

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: Master doctor, my daughter is in green: when you

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: see your time, take her by the band, away with her

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: to the deanery, and dispatch it quickly. Go before

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: into the Park: we two must go together.

speaker: DOCTOR CAIUS
text_entry: I know vat I have to do. Adieu.

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: Fare you well, sir.

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: Exit DOCTOR CAIUS

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: My husband will not rejoice so much at the abuse of

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: Falstaff as he will chafe at the doctor's marrying

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: my daughter: but 'tis no matter; better a little

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: chiding than a great deal of heart-break.

speaker: MISTRESS FORD
text_entry: Where is Nan now and her troop of fairies, and the

speaker: MISTRESS FORD
text_entry: Welsh devil Hugh?

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: They are all couched in a pit hard by Herne's oak,

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: with obscured lights; which, at the very instant of

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: Falstaff's and our meeting, they will at once

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: display to the night.

speaker: MISTRESS FORD
text_entry: That cannot choose but amaze him.

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: If he be not amazed, he will be mocked; if he be

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: amazed, he will every way be mocked.

speaker: MISTRESS FORD
text_entry: We'll betray him finely.

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: Against such lewdsters and their lechery

speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: Those that betray them do no treachery.

speaker: MISTRESS FORD
text_entry: The hour draws on. To the oak, to the oak!

speaker: MISTRESS FORD
text_entry: Exeunt
